I recommend Hitch, Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy, and The Violent Kind.
Hitch is a classic espionage thriller directed by Alfred Hitchcock. The story revolves around a British intelligence officer named George Smiley who has retired from active duty in the MI6 intelligence agency. However, the circumstances surrounding this retirement have forced Smiley to resume his active duty as an intelligence officer in the MI6 intelligence agency. In order to fulfill these responsibilities, Smiley is required to go back to his old office at the MI6 intelligence agency. However, when Smiley returns to his old office at the MI6 intelligence agency, he discovers that there has been a significant change in the structure and organization of the MI6 intelligence agency. Specifically, the MI6 intelligence agency has now undergone a major restructuring and organizational changes, which have resulted in a number of new departments and divisions being established within the MI6 intelligence agency.
